property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT aa.subject_code, aa.system_code, aa.balance_direct , aa.account_month , bb.sum_debit_amount , bb.sum_credit_amount , (aa.opening_balance - IFNULL(bb.sum_amount,0)) remain_amount,(IFNULL(bb.sum_debit_amount,0)+aa.year_debit_amount) year_debit_amount, (IFNULL(bb.sum_credit_amount,0)+aa.year_credit_amount) year_credit_amount from ( select asi.*,si.balance_direct, si.SUBJECT_CODE, si.SYSTEM_CODE from account_settle_info asi, subject_info si where si.id = asi.subject_id /~systemCode: and system_code = {systemCode} ~/ /~subjectCode: and SUBJECT_CODE = {subjectCode} ~/ /~startdate: and account_month >= {startdate} ~/ /~enddate: and account_month <= {enddate} ~/ ) aa left JOIN ( select vi.system_code, vi.account_period, vsi.SUBJECT_CODE, sum(vsi.DEBIT_AMOUNT) sum_debit_amount,sum(vsi.CREDIT_AMOUNT) sum_credit_amount, sum(vsi.AMOUNT) sum_amount from voucher_info vi, voucher_sub_info vsi where vi.id = vsi.VOUCHER_ID GROUP BY vi.system_code, vsi.SUBJECT_CODE) bb on aa.SUBJECT_CODE = bb.SUBJECT_CODE and aa.SYSTEM_CODE = bb.SYSTEM_CODE and aa.account_month = date_format(bb.account_period,'%Y-%m') order by aa.account_month asc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT vsi.SUBJECT_CODE, si.SUBJECT_NAME, sum(vsi.DEBIT_AMOUNT) DEBIT_AMOUNT,sum(vsi.CREDIT_AMOUNT) CREDIT_AMOUNT, IF(si.BALANCE_DIRECT = 'DEBIT', opening_balance, '') OPENING_DEBIT_AMOUNT,IF(si.BALANCE_DIRECT = 'CREDIT', opening_balance, '') OPENING_CREDIT_AMOUNT, IF(si.BALANCE_DIRECT = 'DEBIT', (IFNULL(opening_balance,0)+ IFNULL(sum(vsi.DEBIT_AMOUNT),0)-IFNULL(sum(vsi.CREDIT_AMOUNT),0)), '') CLOSING_DEBIT_AMOUNT, IF(si.BALANCE_DIRECT = 'CREDIT', (IFNULL(opening_balance,0)+IFNULL(sum(vsi.CREDIT_AMOUNT),0)-IFNULL(sum(vsi.DEBIT_AMOUNT),0)), '') CLOSING_CREDIT_AMOUNT FROM voucher_info vi join voucher_sub_info vsi on vi.ID = vsi.VOUCHER_ID join subject_info si on vi.system_code = si.SYSTEM_CODE and vsi.SUBJECT_CODE = si.SUBJECT_CODE left join account_settle_info asi on asi.subject_id = si.ID and asi.account_month = date_format(vi.account_period,'%Y-%m') where 1=1 /~systemCode: and vi.system_code = {systemCode} ~/ /~startdate: and date_format(account_period,'%Y-%m') >= {startdate} ~/ /~enddate: and date_format(account_period,'%Y-%m') <= {enddate} ~/ GROUP BY vsi.SUBJECT_CODE order by SUBJECT_CODE asc
